name: Ouannii
content:
Ouannii was a Rodian keyboardist who often accompanied famous singer Gaya. The Rodian played with Gaya during her time on the MPO-1400 Purgill-class star cruiser Halcyon.
Ouannii was originally seen in the background of concept art of the Crown of Corellia Dining Room, the main dining area of Disney's Star Wars: Galactic Starcruiser hotel. The character was identified in the version of the Star Wars: Datapad mobile app for guests of the hotel, albeit misspelled as "Ouanni."
